name: frenziedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is uncontrolled, excited, and sometimes violent: Young people moved around frenziedly on the dance floor. I spent the next hour frenziedly trying to break free, but it was hopeless.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen the doorbell rang, the dogs began to bark frenziedly.The victim had been frenziedly attacked on a night train."They're all fools!" he shouted, stabbing frenziedly at the keyboard.The more my calls went unanswered, the more my imagination began to work frenziedly.
